item.title: Editing/Animating Course Promos - Upwork
item.description:
The task:
Create a course promo (30-90”), which includes valuable insights based on Lesson 02 of the course material. The promo should include 1-3 actionable insights that our viewers can take away from the video.

Delivery Format:
Formats: 16x9 + 9x16
Resolution: 1080p
All project files to be sent to CXL

All required graphical assets will be provided to the selected motion graphic artist / editor. To make this workflow simpler, we will provide you with proxy files of the instructor’s recordings. You will then send us your project file, and we will then relink the full-resolution camera footage

Examples of previous promos:
Example 01: https://www.linkedin.com/posts/cxldotcom_landing-page-optimization-activity-7208863057014390784--Cp1?utm_source=combined_share_message&utm_medium=member_desktop
Example 02: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AXrFmcDgtNM
Example 03: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E_WhINN4fsQ

You should have an advanced understanding of the English language, as you will be reviewing and selecting from course material in English.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$45.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 12:23 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Motion Graphics, Elearning, Trailer, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing
Skills: Motion Graphics, Elearning, Trailer, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: On-Site Video Editing Assistant (Premiere Pro & After Effects) in Atlanta/Rome Area - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
I am working on a short film and need assistance preparing a rough timeline for the editor. I am looking for an experienced video editing assistant who can help me manage and organize video clips, audio, After Effects footage, and other related files on hard drives. The ideal candidate must be proficient in Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, and file management.

Responsibilities:
Assist in cleaning up the current timeline in Adobe Premiere Pro.
Ensure all video clips, audio files, and After Effects footage are correctly aligned and placed on the timeline.

Link and manage extra files from Dropbox and transfer them to the appropriate folders.

Organize and prepare files and folders on hard drives for the editor.
Work closely with me in person to ensure all elements are correctly managed and transferred.

Requirements:
Proficient in Adobe Premiere Pro and Adobe After Effects.
Strong file management skills.

Ability to work efficiently and accurately under tight deadlines.

We must be able to meet in person in Atlanta, Rome, Cartersville, Kennesaw, or nearby areas so that we can work from the drives.

Reliable and detail-oriented.

Estimated Time Required:
I don't know how long this task will take, but I estimate it will require around five hours. Flexibility is appreciated as the actual time needed may vary.

Location:
Meetings are required in person. If you are near Rome, Cartersville, Kennesaw, or Atlanta, I can drive to your location.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 12:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, File Management, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, File Management, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Shorts Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a  YouTube Shorts Video Editor to join our team! This entry-level position is perfect for individuals who may not have a strong portfolio but are eager to showcase their skills through a 15-30 second test video during the interview process.

Responsibilities:
Edit short-form videos for our YouTube channel.
Ensure that the videos are engaging and align with our content strategy.
Trim, cut, and arrange footage to create seamless and visually appealing content.

Requirements:
Basic video editing skills.
Ability to work efficiently and meet deadlines.
Strong attention to detail.
English proficiency

In the cover letter, please include the word "Mango" at the beginning to indicate that you have read the description fully.

Looking forward to working together!

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 12:14 UTC

item.title: Video Editor For On-Going Brand Needs - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a natural storyteller looking for your next piece of inspiration in short form content?  
We are looking to hire a professional editor experienced in delivering short form branded
content for our company’s various video editing needs. The content that you will be editing may include the following social content, website content, internal/team content, and potentially other content types.

The editor role will interact heavily with the company’s marketing team and key
stakeholders to ensure the company’s content marketing objectives are being met . A creative brief with content guidelines will be provided in addition to in-house creative music and video assets.

Responsibilities:
Review creative brief and social content guidelines
Review raw materials provided by the company.
Assemble and edit video footage, motion graphic templates, animations, and SFX using modern editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, Audition, and Davinci Resolve.
Input music, dialogues, graphics, and effects.
Consultant with company stakeholders within the post-production process.
Performing the full range of editing works from splicing, assembly, sound balancing, to color correction, and color grading.
Edit raw footage content and cutting video sequences to ensure that creative concepts are translated effectively
Ensure all editing cuts, splices, and additions appear seamless and help the story flow more effectively in the final cut.
Discuss project timeline(s), narrative structure and story goals with marketing team along with key procedures
Edit footage into timelines and cut time out of certain shots to create a more impactful story that stays within creative guidelines.

Requirements:
Proven work experience as a video editor.
Advanced experience with editing software packages such as Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, Audition, and Davinci Resolve.
Demonstrable video editing ability with a strong portfolio.
Through knowledge of timing, motivation, and continuity.
Familiarity with special effects, 3D, and composting.
BS degree in film studies, cinematography or related field preferred.
Ability to translate creative ideas into complete projects.
Ability to work to a tight schedule.


Hourly Range: $20.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 11:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, Social Media Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video
Skills: DaVinci Resolve, Social Media Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:
I need these two videos edited below in the next few days and will have more in the future.
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1KbsGecTy7upMFMcJAS_ILEaNrKWNGdzI/view?usp=sharing
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mFeqCR-hxCmrjDTuGsQCLBjUEqNnuqZr/view?usp=sharing

For right now I don't need much editing, basically here's what I need.

1. Brighten up the video a little bit (if possible) but I don't want it to look weird, it's ok its a little dark.

2. Cut out items in the background

3. Add white text at top or bottom when I go over one of the main points.

4. I don't need any b-roll or graphics

item.title: Video Editor for Facebook/Instagram Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Video Editor who can edit our videos specifically for Facebook and Instagram ads. The ideal candidate should have experience in creating engaging and attention-grabbing videos that are optimized for social media platforms. The primary task will be to edit existing video footage and add relevant text, graphics, and effects to make the videos more impactful for our target audience.

  Responsibilities:
  - Edit existing video footage to create compelling ad content
  - Add text, graphics, and effects to enhance the videos
  - Optimize videos for Facebook and Instagram platforms

  Requirements:
  - Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
  - Strong understanding of social media platforms and their video requirements
  - Creative mindset and ability to think outside the box
  - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

  If you have a proven track record of creating successful Facebook and Instagram ads through video editing, we would love to hear from you. Please provide samples of your previous work along with your proposal.


Posted On: June 28, 2024 11:56 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Adobe Premiere Pro, Instagram
Skills: Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Adobe Premiere Pro, Instagram
Country: CYP
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Professional Videographer match and re-create SFX and audio in a sped-up video - Upwork
item.description:
Hello, I’m looking for a Videographer to accurately recreate and add SFX to an opening clip for a game called Save the Queen.

We recently sped up the original video by 5% as we found the original cut to be too long but noticed that the pacing of the narration was too quick even with such a small change in video speed.

Your task would be to match the ambience and feel of the original, IN the sped up video and match the SFX as closely as humanly possible to the original.

We have the following Resources we can share with you

1. The original video to use as a sound/timing/SFX reference

2. The Sped up Video for which the sound has to be re-created

3. All the Narration and Music in its original non sped up format

4. Certain SFX such as the bell, ticking clock, guards marching, unfortunately we do not have majority of the SFX used in the original, so we would rely on a freelancer with access to a library and a good ear to recreate the sounds as closely as we can. As you can hear in the original video the are quite a few different sounds ranging from whooshes, bangs, water effects, cheering within the project.

5. .AEP files given to us by the original videographer however it is believed that these are incomplete. We could not locate all the sounds within the folders shared with us.

We’re hoping to get this sorted within the next 24 hours, we create plenty video projects and if all goes well we have plenty more videos to create, from short promo’s to longer game ads!

Best Regards
Dominik


Budget: $100
Posted On: June 28, 2024 11:44 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Audio Editing, Audio Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Post Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Audio Editing, Audio Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Post Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Country: Singapore
click to apply

item.title: Japanese Video Editor (For Youtube Channel) - Upwork
item.description:
Hi Guys, I am looking for a video editor for my YouTube shorts (Japanese) channel. Check out these shorts to find out the type of editing I need -

1. https://youtube.com/shorts/T9D_q5DuGxY?si=wbVTaIFQ7KeDym7k

This project contains 5 clips. I'll send you 5 clips and all you have to add is add subtitles like it's done In the clip I sent above, but the subtitles will be in Japanese so only contact me if you know Japanese. Each video duration is under 1 minute. Pay for this project is $8 USD.


Requirements, Someone who -

1. Who can understand the English & Japanese language
1. Can emulate this editing style, knows how to increase retention.
2. Know which parts of clips will increase engagement and which parts will not (so they can keep or cut those parts accordingly) to maximize engagement.
4. Very CREATIVE and always learning How to make great edits.

Thank you!
Looking forward to hearing from you guys!


Budget: $8
Posted On: June 28, 2024 11:39 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Adobe After Effects, Wondershare Filmora, Video Editing, AVS Video Editor, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: CapCut, Adobe After Effects, Wondershare Filmora, Video Editing, AVS Video Editor, Adobe Premiere Pro

item.title: Integrate with GIMP a woman into a picture - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for an expert that can make a screen short screen recording video tutorial (in Windows for example: CTRL+G) how to put a fotographed woman into a fantasy image scenery in a way, as if the women was already there before (lighting, shadows, sharpness, color, etc. and other tecnhiques your expertise includes).

Long term job possible for future adding people in to these sceneries.

See attachement


Budget: $20
Posted On: June 28, 2024 11:34 UTC
Category: Image Editing
Skills:Photo Editing, Photo Manipulation, Adobe Photoshop, People, Image Editing, Photo Retouching
Skills: Photo Editing, Photo Manipulation, Adobe Photoshop, People, Image Editing, Photo Retouching

item.title: Car Dashcam videos required - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for dash cam car footage featuring traffic accidents for a research project. We will pay $3 for each hour of usable video.

Requirements:

Location: Videos must be recorded in the European region.

Quality: Videos must be clear and of good quality to ensure that details of the accident are visible . time and should be mention on videos.
Format: Please ensure that the videos are in a common format such as MP4, MOV.

Copyright: Footage must be original and free from any copyright restrictions. You must own the rights to the videos you submit.

Multiple submissions are encouraged if you have a substantial amount of footage.
Payment will be made promptly upon verification of the footage content and quality.
If you have any questions or need further details, We ensure strict confidentiality and compliance with privacy regulations.

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 28, 2024 11:26 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Data Collection
Skills: Data Collection
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Funny Ai image creator - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for someone who can create funny pictures for YouTube Shorts. The pictures I need can be anything (cats, dogs, The Rock, Shrek, etc.). These are two examples of the type of videos I want to make:

https://www.youtube.com/shorts/ABlDZASa0hw
https://www.youtube.com/shorts/dwdjHh5S3qs

I have also attached a few images as examples of the kind of photos I need.

I will provide you with a script and the sound for the video. The script will specify how many images I need per video. I would like to make one test video, and if it goes well, we can create more videos! Send me a message if you can help!

Hourly Range: $3.00-$5.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 11:15 UTC
Category: AI Image Generation & Editing
Skills:AI Image Editing, AI Image Generation
Skills: AI Image Editing, AI Image Generation
Country: Netherlands

item.title: Looking for a video-editor (animated videos) for a Youtube health niche (animal-based) Channel - Upwork
item.description:
In search of a professional and experienced (animated) video editor to handle the full video creation
process, producing high quality Youtube content/videos in length of around 8-10 minutes, 4-5
videos produced per month.

*Please read this carefully before applying for this job.*
The ideal candidate/team will have worked on YouTube automation channels before with
measurable success, have extensive knowledge of Youtube guidelines/copyright rules/fair
use policies, strong editing skills and access to Stock Footage sites as well as experience
with and use of VidIQ or Tubebuddy. Videos must be able to be monetized.

We Want to Work With You If:
- You have experience in producing bingeable content with Youtube.
- You understand how to keep viewers engaged with good pacing, transitions etc.
- You have experience working under tight deadlines
- You are committed to high quality without the need for lots of revisions.
- You are organized, communicative and has fast turnaround times.
- You can deliver items via Google Drive
- You have a sense of humor

Video requirements:
- Video workflow: 10 second bait intro, channel intro, follow IG/subscribe pop ups, and then
keep the content in the body edited in a way that is funny, engaging and entertaining.
Ending with channel end screens.
- Add in copyright free sound effects/background music where applicable, not in excess.
- Source and use copyright free clips and have stock footage access to use licensed clips.
- Edit the video in a bingeable type style that is captivating to the audience, CTR and
retention rate focused, 1080p HD+, make use of lower-thirds/text/transitions where
applicable. Professional video editing software only - Adobe Premiere Pro, Davinci Resolve
or Final Cut Pro.

Why we are awesome to work with:
- You'll fill your portfolio with a variety of professional video samples
- We have high-quality standards, which means awesome training – you'll learn a ton
- Work from wherever you want (as long as we can reach you)
- There is PLENTY of work to go around, and no cap on what you can edit
- We recognize talent and promote from within
- Kickass bonuses and incentives

Job requirements:
- 1-2 videos per week
- 8 minutes+ videos
- $20-35 per video

Priority given to the video editor that best matches the Job Description. Budget is $35 per
video, negotiable for higher pay for **proven work of high quality and results based track
record**.

Please send current portfolio/sample work for review.


Posted On: June 28, 2024 11:14 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Animation, Explainer Video, 2D Animation
Skills: Video Editing, Animation, Explainer Video, 2D Animation
Country: Netherlands
click to apply
